faq_q1: Where does the name Bee Bridges Interactive come from?
faq_r1: Our name carries a dual meaning that guides our vision. "Bee" represents teamwork and collective creation. It also resonates with the Bambara word "bɛɛ", meaning "everyone". Combined with "Bridges", it embodies our mission: "Everyone together on the bridges" — creating connections between cultures, genres, and media through engaging video games expanded into authentic transmedia experiences.
faq_q2: "Hey, isn’t this the same team as Blind Bend Studio?"
faq_r2: Yes, that’s us! Bee Bridges Interactive represents the evolution of our passion, with a renewed vision to share our creations with an even wider audience.
faq_q3: What makes your transmedia approach unique?
faq_r3: Unlike a simple adaptation, we design stories from the start to live across multiple media. The video game is the core experience, but key story elements can be found in a comic, a podcast… creating a coherent and rich narrative ecosystem.
faq_q4: Is diversity at the heart of all your projects?
faq_r4: Yes, because it reflects the real world. It’s not a “topic” but a foundation. Our characters and universes are built to entertain first, while representing human complexity.
faq_r5: We are currently developing "Blind Frontiers", our next immersive narrative experience. Learn more at www.blindfrontiers.com
faq_q6: Where can I follow your latest news?
faq_r6: Instagram, TikTok, Discord, LinkedIn, and our newsletter are the best ways to follow our announcements, behind-the-scenes content, and transmedia updates.
faq_q7: Are you hiring? Do you offer internships?
faq_r7: We announce all our opportunities (jobs, discovery internships) on our social platforms. If no active offer is visible, it means we cannot welcome new talent at the moment — but we truly appreciate your interest.
faq_q8: Do you accept collaborations with other creators?
faq_r8: Absolutely! We’re always open to partnerships with artists, musicians, or other studios whose vision aligns with ours. Contact us through our form or at contact@beebridgesinteractive.com.
